analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/36/0xacf58bec5622a6de8df2f380281b7dc2224f662b.sol:
	Contract Axioms has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0xacf58bec5622a6de8df2f380281b7dc2224f662b.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/36/0xacf58bec5622a6de8df2f380281b7dc2224f662b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/36/0xacf58bec5622a6de8df2f380281b7dc2224f662b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/36/0xacf58bec5622a6de8df2f380281b7dc2224f662b.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
